description: Under the Major Schemes programme we have provided funding for large projects, particularly to improve streets and cycling facilities

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The focus of the Major Schemes Programme is on high value schemes (costing more than Â£1m) that help to deliver the 2013 Mayor's Cycling Vision document and which support the Better Streets agenda."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Funding for Major Schemes is awarded through a competitive bidding process. This follows a three-step progression described in detail in the Guidance for Submission of Major Schemes.
